title: The Dollar's Role in American Empire, with David Adler and Daniel Bessner (PODCAST 2-04-2020)
description:
David Adler of the Democracy in Europe Movement and the University of Washington’s Daniel Bessner join me to discuss the US dollar’s global influence and how that it with the more overtly military aspects of Empire USA. Their recent The New Republic piece is called “To End Forever War, End the Dollar’s Global Dominance.” Enjoy!



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit fx.substack.com/subscribe
dc:creator: Derek Davison
itunes:author: Derek Davison
